text: Under the Radar is the third full-length studio album by the hardcore band Grade. It was released by Victory Records on October 12, 1999. ==Track listing== # "The Inefficiency of Emotion" # "For The Memory of Love" # "Seamless" # "The Tension Between Stillness and Motion" # "Victims of Mathematics" # "A Year in the Past, Forever in the Future" # "The Worst Lies Are Told in Silence" # "Second Chance at First Place" # "Stolen Bikes Ride Faster" # "When Something Goes to Your Head" # "Triumph and Tragedy" ==References== * Category:1999 albums Category:Victory Records albums Category:Grade (band) albums
title: Under the Radar (Grade album)
